report.title: Get taxon_lists_taxa_taxon_list_attribute records for a taxa_taxon_list_attribute
report.description: Retrieve details of taxon_lists_taxa_taxon_list_attribute records for a given taxa_taxon_list_attribute.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM taxon_lists_taxa_taxon_list_attributes tlttla JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attributes ttla on ttla.id=tlttla.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id and ttla.deleted=false WHERE tlttla.deleted=false

column.name: taxon_lists_taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id
column.display: Taxon Lists Taxa Taxon List Attribute ID
